parts.text: {"word":"agudo","priority":"☆☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"(スペイン語) 鋭い、尖った、鋭敏な、高い (音)","english_definition":"(Spanish) sharp, pointed, keen, high (sound).","examples":[{"sentence":"Tiene un sentido del humor agudo.","translation":"He has a sharp sense of humor. (彼は鋭いユーモアのセンスを持っている。)","language":"es"},{"sentence":"El cuchillo tiene un filo agudo.","translation":"The knife has a sharp edge. (そのナイフは鋭い刃を持っている。)","language":"es"},{"sentence":"La nota era muy aguda.","translation":"The note was very high-pitched. (その音はとても高かった。)","language":"es"}],"collocations":["dolor agudo (鋭い痛み)","ángulo agudo (鋭角)","sonido agudo (高い音)","ingenio agudo (鋭い機知)"],"synonyms":["afilado","penetrante","inteligente","perspicaz","alto"],"antonyms":["romo","grave","sordo","torpe"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(スペイン語文法) アグーダ (アクセントが最後の音節にある単語)","english_definition":"(Spanish grammar) aguda (a word with the stress on the last syllable).","examples":[{"sentence":"'Corazón' es una palabra aguda.","translation":"'Corazón' is an aguda word. ('Corazón'はアグーダの単語です。)","language":"es"}],"collocations":[],"synonyms":[],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の 'acutus' (鋭い、尖った) に由来。","language":"es"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/aˈɣuðo/","notes":"スペイン語の発音。g は [x] または [ɣ] の音。","language":"es"},"inflection":{"notes":"形容詞は性数一致します。agudo (男性単数), aguda (女性単数), agudos (男性複数), agudas (女性複数)","language":"es"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Agudo' は、物理的な鋭さ、知的な鋭さ、音の高さなど、様々な意味で使われます。文法用語としては、最後の音節にアクセントがある単語を指します。","language":"es"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"El dolor era muy agudo. (痛みはとても鋭かった。) [発音を英語風に]",correct":"El dolor era muy agudo. (痛みはとても鋭かった。) [スペイン語の発音で]","note":"スペイン語の発音を正しく行うことが重要です。"}],"language":"es"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["agudamente (鋭く)","agudeza (鋭さ)"],"language":"es"},"level_frequency":{},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"'Agudo' はスペイン語の単語で、英語の 'sharp' に近い意味を持ちます。物理的な鋭さ、知的な鋭さ、音の高さなどを表すことができます。また、文法用語としても使われます。","language":"es"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"El lápiz tiene una punta aguda.","translation":"The pencil has a sharp point. (その鉛筆は鋭い先を持っている。)","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"鋭い","language":"es"},{"sentence":"Es una persona muy aguda para los negocios.","translation":"He is a very sharp person in business. (彼はビジネスにおいてとても鋭い人だ。)","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"鋭敏な","language":"es"},{"sentence":"La flauta emitió un sonido agudo.","translation":"The flute emitted a high-pitched sound. (フルートは高い音を発した。)","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"高い (音)","language":"es"},{"sentence":"'Café' es una palabra aguda.","translation":"'Café' is an aguda word. ('Café'はアグーダの単語です。)","type":"noun","meaning_category":"アグーダ","language":"es"}]}
